body.p:
Bowling green Ky January 7th 1861
To His Excellency Hon. B. Magoffin

Dear sir your humble petitioner is a man 24 years old that has bin afflicted all off his Life with the asthma and has just got cured of that and is not able to perform manuel Labor I have ben a Reading Law for some time I ask the appointment of Notary Public for to take Deppositions for Bowling green and Warren county if the recommendations that I send are all Right in your Judgment I would bee glad to Receive the appointment direct yours to me at Bowling green Ky
